website_summaries.verdict: Fully automatic ice cream maker that's easy to use as long as you have some extra space in your freezer.
pros: Ice cream is ready in as little as 20 minutes
cons: You must freeze the bowl ahead of time
Unit is very loud when running

customer_reviews.title: Big crack
customer_reviews.text: Had this maker 6 wks and used it only twice. left it in the freezer for 24 hrs. and the outer case has a huge crack going down the outside, hoping I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren McQ

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse!
customer_reviews.text: LIVE LOVE EAT WELL! I have come to create my own recipe for sugar free ice cream and THIS bad boy can whip out 1.5 qts in about 15 mins! I wish I could find another bowl for it!
customer_reviews.author: ReniLyn

customer_reviews.title: 20 Minute Miracle Worker!
customer_reviews.text: I used my pretty red ice cream machine for the first time last evening and it worked great! I was birthday gifted one made by a majorly swanky brand some years back and actually gave it away. This one works much better! I followed the directions carefully and in 20 minutes we had beautiful scoopable vanilla ice cream. I used the recipe that includes eggs that came with it, but it was too rich. I'll tweak that but the machine itself could not have done better!
customer_reviews.author: Natural Health Doc

customer_reviews.title: Make delicious gelato
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but did not come with ear protection. I churn mine in the laundry room with a towel wrapped around it to keep the noise down. For thicker creams like gelato get it running first, and then pour cream in from the top! If you don't it freezes to the sides before you can get it going.
customer_reviews.author: ssippishark

customer_reviews.title: Well, it makes ice cream. LOL
customer_reviews.text: This little machine makes ice cream pretty well...but it comes out a bit like soft serve...except it tastes better than what you get at the golden arches (mostly because it's fresh and not made from some strange looking slurry-like liquid...and you can choose what quality of ingredients to use). It's a total win for a bowl of ice cream...but not so much if you're looking to be able to put it on a cone or in a root beer float. Like I said, it makes soft ice cream. Aside from that, it's been a wonderful little friend. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Aerdnna

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: We sent it back. I tried it 3 times & it didn't work well at all. It kept freezing to the sides & wouldn't spin. After I had sent it back, I saw a comment saying you should add the liquid as it was spinning. I put it in & turned it in like the directions indicated. It is plastic. The "churn" part is plastic. It is not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: A bit loud, and may walk itself off the counter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to make my own "healthy" ice cream. Yes, at bit of an oxymoron but I figured I'd give it a whirl. As others mentioned, it is a bit loud which isn't a deal breaker. I decided I would put it in my garage. I left it unattended for and as the ice cream froze, the paddle would start to jam which caused the unit to move. I came back 15 minutes later to see the content on the floor. The ice cream was frozen along the chamber walls but did not manage to freeze some of the content in the center. Ultimately, I decided this was not the product for me.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney and Devin Lattin

customer_reviews.title: The non-stick finish inside the bowl corrodes.  The one-year warranty is a non-warranty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these units. If I followed the directions, starting the machine empty and pouring in the contents while it was running I had no trouble making ice cream in 15 minutes. The problem I have is that after only four uses the non-stick finish is beginning to corrode with a metalic powder surfacing in the bowl. If you look closely at the warranty, you are required to pay round trip shipping in order to return the bowls which they may or may not replace at their discretion. I would call this a non-warranty disguised as a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dan Collie

customer_reviews.title: Not solid ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I used good ingredients to make my "ice cream soup" in this maker. I froze the bowl for nearly 2 days my second time around. Had the ingredients just right, mixed it for over an hour. Still came out as slightly more like soft serve style "soup". It was way too runny to actually be considered as soft serve. It was a great prep machine for mixing up the 'soup' so I could actually freeze it overnight in the freezer safe bowl. Unless I'm missing something in the directions, I definitely wouldn't recommend this ice cream "soup" maker.
customer_reviews.author: Janean L. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't thicken as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this machine a few times as per the instructions and have been disappointed with the results. It never seems to thicken as it should and I had to put the canister back into the freezer just to get it thick. It is also very noisy and the stirring mechanism seems a bit flimsy. So it's probably a good thing that it doesn't get too thick because it could break during the stirring process. It's a good price but next time I'll pay a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Leathers Bangor, Maine

customer_reviews.title: ... to save a few dollars however I was very disappointed. No matter how I tried
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this model in an effort to save a few dollars however I was very disappointed. No matter how I tried, all I ended up with was mix that froze to the sides of the freezer canister locking up the paddle. I sent this back and purchased the one I really wanted in the first place, the Cuisinart ICE-21 and that one didn't disappoint! Save yourself the time and spend the extra money on a better brand/model. This ice cream maker was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: IvyToadFoot

customer_reviews.title: This item worked wonderfully for the first 2 batches of ice cream
customer_reviews.text: This item worked wonderfully for the first 2 batches of ice cream........After the third batch we noticed the red plastic was cracked all down one side.........We took it out of the freezer, let it air dry and warm up and then cleaned it all up again and left it to dry.......the next morning there was a crusty looking residue on the counter where I think the liquid that makes it cold leaked out.......It worked wonderfully but I wouldn't say it was worth the money if it breaks after 3 batches......We followed all manufacters instructions to the tee........The original box is gone and there is no place on amazon that shows how to return this product..........I would look elsewhere........
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Ice Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest thing to use and makes the Best Ice Cream. I thought Blue Bell and other Store Brands were Tops. Well try this and you will not be buying much of theirs anymore. So easy to use, a breeze to clean and 'To Die For Ice Cream'. Love the Red color too. Get one you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Train

customer_reviews.title: But that way it was fine. While it was working I was ready to ...
customer_reviews.text: It did produce ice cream in 40 minutes, and it was delicious -- but it was so noisy that I had to put it in the bathroom with the door closed. I was hoping to have it on the kitchen counter. But that way it was fine. While it was working I was ready to send it back. But then the ice cream was so good, and it was half the cost of the competitors version, so oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Safety concern
customer_reviews.text: Always took over an hour to get the ice cream consistency and even still had to put the ice cream in the freezer afterwards to get it to firm up. More importantly, while in use, unbeknowingly, a hole was punctured in the side of our container and the liquid leaked into our ice cream mix and made us incredibly sick. Cannot recommend this product for safety reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Lynann Barr

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Start out ok then started making a loud noise & just rock back & forth like a washmachine. Needless to say were very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Bill paige

customer_reviews.title: sounds like a pneumatic drill and doesn't actually get cold enough
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of ice cream makers before where you freeze the bowl so I thought I knew what I was buying with this one, but this one is a real dud. It takes up a huge amount of space, sounds like a pneumatic drill and doesn't actually get cold enough to freeze the ice cream. If I hadn't stupidly thrown away the packaging before trying it I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even use this. When I opened the maker the bowl wasn't clean, it was sticky and looked like it had a big crack in the bowl. The hole looks like it was gouged out. If your thinking about buying this product from this company thinking it is cheap but is still useable. Save yourself money and DON'T buy it from here. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elene

customer_reviews.title: Makes great ice cream, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this item used, and it has been a great purchase. Depending on the recipe, I end up with ice cream that has that same texture as store-bought (after freezing a couple of hours). It's been really easy to use as well. Freeze the thing, make the base, turn it on, pour it in the base, wait 20 minutes, check it, remove it when done, eat it! I love it for making strange flavors like goat cheese...
customer_reviews.author: Annie J

customer_reviews.title: You must plan ahead but the amazing ice cream this small makes is crazy good
customer_reviews.text: The freezer can part of the maker must be frozen ahead of time, around 12 hours ahead of time. Then, once you mix up your ice cream recipe, it needs to be chilled overnight. But then, when you are ready, when you turn on the maker, your amazing ice cream is ready is about 25-30 minutes. Pretty fun to make. Trying strawberry sorbet nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Fan

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, but is kind of a hassle.
customer_reviews.text: It makes okay ice cream- sort of grainy and soft though. It takes up a lot of freezer space though to freeze the ice cream. You have to plan ahead as well and freeze the whole canister before you use it. Fun project, but I don't foresee this being a thing I use very often.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeWrites

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: The maker is the perfect size for a small amount of ice cream. Three or four large servings and there's nothing left to freeze. Freezes in less than 20 minutes so making ice cream is quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Ice cream and 4 out of 5 of my ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the appliances I have bought that SO FAR has exceeded expectation! Makes Great Ice cream and 4 out of 5 of my recipes have been awesome! the one that wasn't was my fault for not cooling the mixture before trying to make it! I would 100% endorse it. I am making Low Carb Ice Cream with simple ingredients and it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: R.T.H.

customer_reviews.title: Plan ahead for the best ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Best little ice cream maker around. No ice. No salt and ready in 40 minutes or less. The only draw back is the bowl really needs to freeze at least 24 hours before use to get ice cream consistency. I tend to store the bowl in the freezer so it's always ready.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Whitbeck

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast and easy this made ice cream. The only issues I have are that it was a little more noisy than I thought it should be and the unit did not spin smoothly (it had a continuous wobble).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had only used the kind with all the ice and the rock salt and found it to be an annoying process. This ice cream maker lived u
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical with this ice cream maker. I had only used the kind with all the ice and the rock salt and found it to be an annoying process. This ice cream maker lived up to my expectations, save one thing, the noise level has not yet improved from the old school ice cream makers. I would not try to watch a tv show in the same room while running this ice cream maker, but it does work great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great! not near as loud as I expected it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! not near as loud as I expected it to be. I watched videos and it sounded a lot louder on the videos. It's not quiet by any means, but it's not extremely loud either. I left the bucket in the freezer for 24 hours before trying it out and it froze the ice cream in about 20 - 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: T & C

customer_reviews.title: It's so good I hate it
customer_reviews.text: What was I thinking, buying an ice cream maker???? As long as I can discipline myself to just make small amounts (works great for a cup or less) and am careful with my ingredients, I think I might be able to keep this without gaining 50 lbs. Honestly, it's awesome. <sigh>
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Such Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this only twice. It works great. Would need to freeze the ice cream if you want to be able to actually scoop but it's so much fun with the grandkids! and it's like soft serve consistency. Love, love, love being able to make your own flavors, add candies etc. Would recommend. Only negative would be the noise.
customer_reviews.author: 2ofus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Easy! Contol ingredients! One of my favorite kitchen items!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! We use this all the time! I love that I can control my ingredients! I can add half sugar, half stevia, no preservatives, real vanilla...I can make coconut icecream...sorbet! We use mostly in the summer, but we use it in the winter too! Guests always rave!
customer_reviews.author: ccssbec

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the $$
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My daughter in law made me some ice cream and she has this maker, I went on amazon and purchased it that day. I made my first batch of home made vanilla ice cream and I added praline pecans and I followed directions to the t and had amazing ice cream! I searved it as a desert last night at a small dinner party and everyone loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Made the best ice cream I ever tasted the very first time I used it. Then after that it stopped working. Amazon refunded my money immediately and I didn’t have to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Tricardo

customer_reviews.title: I like the machine
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the machine. It replaced one that had a frozen base instead of a cistern style container. My complaint with this one is that it's really REALLY loud. Like, they didn't try insulating the motor at all loud. But, for the price, it works.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Broke by the 3rd time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I was only able to use it twice because by the third time the container that you freeze to make the ice cream had cracked in my freezer. I don't know why, but it did. I would recommend that you save up and buy a better ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It is the perfect size for just ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine works perfectly. I love it. It is the perfect size for just me. It made a quart of sorbet in 15 minutes. Great machine for small batches. There are lots of recipes I can't wait to try.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL WASTE OF SPACE AND MONEY, COMPLETE JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money, the motor turns the cylinder and not the paddle so when the ice cream starts to freeze the paddle jams and refuses to allow the cylinder to turn. Not worth the money for returns so I'm gonna junk it and buy a cusinart one when I can afford it or get a nastalgia brand one that takes ice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly89

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in how this item arrived
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived without being in a box or bag and was damaged with some form of a wet residue that had damaged the site of the box. This was supposed to be for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. But it’s noisy and there’s no lid to cover the top. I do love the ice cream though!
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Worked only once
customer_reviews.text: Used it one time and didn't turn on after. Waste of time and money. It was also very loud. You get what you pay for. I would recommend spending a little more money on a better ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Glad we got this little wonder!
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine. Made delicious ice cream first time! Key is to follow directions precisely, and it will turn out fine. Our family loves ice cream all year round, this will be a great item to have in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: miss1211piggy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my Hamilton Beach ice cream maker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Hamilton Beach ice cream maker. I read the reviews before purchasing & found the majority complained about the noise of the machine. It's not bad at all, just a little louder than a dishwasher. Some said it overflowed & if you let it go longer than 30 minutes, it will overflow, just keep an eye on it. I give 5 stars & love my purchase & highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Arasmith

customer_reviews.title: So loud!
customer_reviews.text: This is ok if you can stand the noise it makes it’s mind numbingly loud recommend you set it up to run in the basement or somewhere far away as it has to run for some time
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Weber

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Ice Cream Maker 1.5 Qt.
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker performs very well - turns out a well-mixed ice cream. The only complaint I would have is the noise level of the motor as it's churning - it's loud enough that we have to move it into another room. Other than that, it's very easy to use and clean-up is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: 927lmm

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: It looked nice but I returned it. I'm not sure if I just got a defective machine but it was very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, but very loud!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ice cream maker for the most part. I feel that making ice cream from scratch in about 45 minutes is great! My only downside to this is how loud it is! My husband made me put this in another room and shut the door last time we used it! It is annoyingly loud when churning the ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It works best if you take the freezer part out just before use, then turn it on before adding the mixture. It will always need refreezing afterwards unless you like slush, so plan ahead for when you want it ready. I really enjoy knowing what's in my ice cream- no additives or preservtives! No cellulose!
customer_reviews.author: Postalannie13

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker is perfect if you're asking sorbet. I love it a little less for ice cream. You'll definitely have to use xanthan gum and guar gum and maybe some agar to keep your ice cream stable.
customer_reviews.author: Bye Felicia

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbearably LOUD!!! I should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK PROPERLY
customer_reviews.text: At first the ice cream maker was awesome...first 3 batches. I decided to make some ice cream last night...the bowl was in freezer about 12 hours - after a few minutes the cream and milk froze so hard on side of bowl that it would not churn, and did not make the ice cream, the plastic lid also cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to make homemade ice cream and this ice cream maker works wonders. It is a little loud but so is every other ice cream maker I have seen. It doesn't take very long to churn and stays cold long enough for you to move it to another container. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: lacee

customer_reviews.title: We love how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: My kids and I have been making a ton of ice cream since we got this product. We love how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Wecht

customer_reviews.title: Great ice cream maker.
customer_reviews.text: I made so much ice cream during the holidays and this machine worked as well as my old Cuisinart. I made pistachio ice cream. fresh strawberry, chocolate with candy canes, vanilla and cherry chocolate. Keep the cold tub in the freezer when not using and it is ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Peloni

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Love it Does not Freeze like I THOUGHT Kinda like a Milk Milk Shake is all it Does
customer_reviews.author: Dena Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Good deal considering the price. It works well (*as long as you cool the ice cream mixture and freezer container as much as possible*). My main problem with this ice cream maker is it's REALLY LOUD, so no late night ice cream parties if you have roommates who need their eight hours. Covering the whole thing with a partially folded towel helped muffle the sound a bit. The power cord is also kind of short.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Quiet for this type of machine.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and isn’t nearly as loud as others on the market. The wife has had a lot of fun making ice cream and sorbet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Who wants Ice cream
customer_reviews.text: A little loud but does the job. Kids love it
customer_reviews.author: freshprince130

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. Not having to use rock salt is great ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Not having to use rock salt is great because my kids leak it everywhere. Easy to use, easy to clean and while I wish it made more ice cream. It only takes 20 minutes (after chilling the ingredients). One can dump cookies or Peanut Butter or anything else right into the mix.....Yum.
customer_reviews.author: David Bingham

customer_reviews.title: 17 minutes to great ice cream
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite kitchen appliances! I love that I can make coconut milk, low sugar ice cream in 17 minutes!!
customer_reviews.author: mickic

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker got an "ok" rating because it was really loud when turned on! You could hear it throughout the entire house. We went outside and you could still hear it on the patio. It was simple to operate and the ice cream (made w coconut milk) turned out ok...
customer_reviews.author: michael renee

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy but noisy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and clean. And quick! Hate that it’s so noisy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works very well! The noise level is tolerable, but can be annoying at times. Can't get better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie A.

customer_reviews.title: This did not freeze our ice cream
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time & the ice cream got semisoft and then turned back to liquid again,
customer_reviews.author: Mushroom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ice cream in a short time!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new ice cream maker! Fast and easy to make. A little loud but the price was super affordable and the outcome was the best! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: homemade ice cream in 20 mins!
customer_reviews.text: Makes awesome ice cream! just follow the directions, and use recipes found online and you get great ice cream Definitely has that home made flavor *use vanilla bean instead of flavoring, you won't be disappointed lol
customer_reviews.author: MattTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Worth the fun.
customer_reviews.text: Works well fun to try and make new flavors. My kid likes it but seems slow sometimes
customer_reviews.author: D Blan

customer_reviews.title: I don't find it to be overly loud - I could easily do work in the same room
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a powerhouse. I have made four successful batches of ice cream with it. I don't find it to be overly loud - I could easily do work in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It isn't as easy to make ice cream as I hoped. I just can't get this to work for me. The well gets warmer faster than ice cream can freeze. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kudabeck's reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use when babies are sleeping.
customer_reviews.text: Love the speed of this item to make ice cream. Recipes in instruction book are perfect. Easy instructions and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tamala K Simental

customer_reviews.title: It makes real ice cream...for serious!
customer_reviews.text: Seems legit...just got it yesterday and made my first batch today. After 30 minutes it was a soft serve ice cream and after a few hours in the freezer it turned into regular ice cream. Absolutely no issues!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Way too loud
customer_reviews.text: WAY too loud. I live in an apartment and I'm sure my neighbors did not appreciate the noise. I couldn't even hear my TV when it was running.
customer_reviews.author: Evan G Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Tried making Paleo coconut milk ice cream with this. ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried making Paleo coconut milk ice cream with this. It did not churn into solid ice cream but I did not use regular ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett

customer_reviews.title: Don't over fill!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. But make sure you pour your mixture over not under the paddles. If your recipe has you add the base then the cream make sure you add it at the same time, adding even 10 seconds later make the machine almost usable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Tried to make icecream,for one hour it was functioning but not getting thick.still flowing consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Rose c

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just constant problems the few times we've used it. Noisy, rocking around (the frozen cylinder), turns side to side like it's finished when we just put in the cold mixture. It's a royal pain! Suggestion: DO NOT BUY. TRY SOMETHING BETTER QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: 6 Months And......
customer_reviews.text: It does all it claims to, no problems in 6 months. It's a little bit noisy, but its just for a few minutes and the changes kind of let's you know when it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Janis R.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s quick and easy to clean but just a little too loud. I fix it by sticking a hand towel under it and then another over it. But it’s fast, easy, and affordable
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Ice Cream Machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine for the money is by far an excellent machine and does a magnificent job at making ice cream in as little as 20 minutes. I have tried two different recipes. One from Facebook and one from the booklet that came with the machine and both recipes turned out awesome in 20 minutes. I give it 5☆'s because it does everything it says it can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because it stopped working the first time I used it. I had to freeze my ice-cream mixture. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: #LovetoShop

customer_reviews.title: Okay for basic ice cream
customer_reviews.text: Works okay, but don't try to make any specialty ice cream with nuts or chocolate chips. Does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Ice Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Works as described! Yes, it is a little loud, but for us it is a novelty item and fun to use and create your own ice cream flavors. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Winters

customer_reviews.title: So much PREP
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker seems like it would be great but there is so much prep that goes into making such a small amount of product. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel rossainzz

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with this purchase. I have had inconsistent ...
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with this purchase. I have had inconsistent results with this machine and overall build quality seems to be fair..
customer_reviews.author: Alan Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, and it's quick
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, and it's quick. Easy to use as well. Pretty happy with it overall. Very noisy though, just FYI. If you like white noise, it will fit you perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: When I finally read the instructions, they confirmed that ...
customer_reviews.text: When I finally read the instructions, they confirmed that I needed to mix and chill all ingredients and turn on the machine before I start it - otherwise, small amounts of liquid freeze to the side and bowl can't turn.
customer_reviews.author: CPA/tax preparer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it tonight with a raspberry ice cream recipe from Ben and Jerrys book and it turned out great. It is a bit soft when done so we just put it in containers in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey R.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased with this at all
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with this at all. Takes a very long time to freeze the ice cream mixture and never quite gets it”churned” very well. Have tried a couple different recipes and none have been successful.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Witt

customer_reviews.title: Ordered it came on time but wouldn't turn on was ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it came on time but wouldn't turn on was broken. The second one I got after you freeze the bowl you have wash it out again otherwise it won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved while it lasted but won't buy a replacement
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for about 6 times, the bucket cracked while in the process of making ice cream. Leaked all over my cabinet... I loved while it lasted but won't buy a replacement.. I am guessing it cracked in the freezing process.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: Very loud motor
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Super loud. Can hear it all the way upstairs on the other side of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I left it in the freezer and it made ice-cream with a slushy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little machine
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little machine...it works great..I read complaints that it was noisy...well it not like it runs all day...doesn't cost a mint and works great!
customer_reviews.author: nosugar

customer_reviews.title: which I love (and was definitely worth the extra $35)
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last very long at all, the motor was weak and overheated constantly. Ended up returning it in favor of the 2qt Cuisinart ICE-30BC model, which I love (and was definitely worth the extra $35).
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C.

customer_reviews.title: As a gift
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as a gift for Christmas. Cant wait for the person to use it to know how it works!
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Fuller

customer_reviews.title: I can't hear you
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time. works good, but it is so loud. Its almost 50 decibels.. get some earplugs. I would send it back but I threw the box away.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ice Cream Maker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Ice Cream Maker. All you have to do is add the mix and it blends it and makes it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy!
customer_reviews.text: This ice cream maker froze the ice cream but was so noisy had to put it in another room! Sent it back would not buy another one. Ordered different one.
customer_reviews.author: sandra smothers

customer_reviews.title: We have made one batch of ice cream since we ...
customer_reviews.text: We have made one batch of ice cream since we purchased the machine. It was delicious, but it came out more as a frosty, we may have done it incorrectly. Will try again! Oh, and the frosty was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Ed R.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but results are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing is how loud it is but apparently all ice cream machines are. My ice cream turned out amazing and this was awesome for the price and it’s easy to clean! Only took 20 minutes and 4 ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Freezing poor. Made a loose slush. Certainly not ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Linda Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding gift. They love it! They said it is easy to use and they love they do not have to purchase salt for it. I plan to purchase one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Grubbs

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 68880 Ice Cream Maker, 1.5-Quart, White, 040094688807
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteWith Hamilton Beach Ice Cream Makers, you can enjoy creating homemade ice cream, frozen yogurt, sherbet and gelato in your own kitchen. Just add your favorite ingredients, sit back and relax-you'll be scooping delicious ice-cold desserts in no time. Smart design touches make Hamilton Beach Ice Cream Makers easy to use, even if you're a beginner. Simple-to-follow recipes are included with these popular ice cream makers, so your family can make all kinds of delectable treats right from the start.
feature_bullets: Homemade ice cream-ready in as little as 20 minutes
Makes ice cream, frozen yogurt, custard, sherbert or gelato
